projects.title: NetflixGPT
projects.subtitle: Movie Recommendation Platform
desc: Integrated GPT's API for movie recommendations based on user queries.
Implemented user authentication and form validation using Firebase.
Utilized Redux Toolkit for state management and memoization to optimize performance.

projects.title: VideoX
projects.subtitle: Dynamic Video Discovery Platform
desc: Integrated YouTube's live API for real-time data updates.
Implemented features such as search, video playback, and auto-suggestion.
Optimized performance with Redux caching and debouncing in the search bar.

projects.title: Travel Advisor
projects.subtitle: Location Based Web App
desc: Built a ReactJS app using the Travel-Advisor API for nearby places.
Utilized Axios for data retrieval and React-Google-Maps API for interactive map display.
Styled the app with Sass and deployed it on Firebase for online accessibility.

projects.title: Speedy-Eats
projects.subtitle: Food Delivery Web App
desc: Created a responsive ReactJS app, mimicking Swiggy's functionality.
Implemented Tailwind CSS for a modern UI.
Used Redux Toolkit for 'Add to Cart' feature.
Integrated Shimmer UI and search feature.

projects.title: FriendBook
projects.subtitle: Social Media Website
desc: Used React Query to fetch user data and posts from API
Used JSON Web Token (JWT) and Cookies for authentication
Used React Context API for implementing dark mode functionality

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.subtitle: Personal Portfolio Website
desc: A personal portfolio website built using Next.js and TypeScript
Showcases frontend skills
Deployed on firebase hosting
Used Tailwind CSS for styling
